DOC.brief_summary: The trial conduct Europe . This clinical pharmacology trial investigates effect exercise pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics inhale insulin subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Exercise Absorption Inhaled Human Insulin Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes equal 12 month Baseline HbA1c less equal 11 % Body mass index ( BMI ) less equal 29 kg/m2 Normal lung volume Treatment intensify insulin therapy least 3 month Any present history pulmonary disease Any finding cardiopulmonary exercise test compromise safety moderate exercise Impaired hepatic renal function Cardiac problem Uncontrolled hypertension Current proliferative retinopathy maculopathy Treatment drug , may interfere insulin action , glucose metabolism recovery hypoglycaemia ( judged investigator ) Current smoke smoking within last 6 month Blood donation ( 500 mL ) within last nine week
